TEXT.TITLE: THERMO ELECTRON <TMO> SELLS CONVERTIBLE DEBT
TEXT.BODY: Thermo Electron Corp is raising 75 mln dlrs via an offering of convertible subordinated debentures due 2012 with a 5-3/4 pct coupon and par pricing, said lead manager Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's stock at 30.50 dlrs per share, representing a premium of 25.77 pct over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for two years, the issue is rated Ba-3 by Moody's Investors and BB by Standard and Poor's. Drexel Burnham and Tucker Anthony co-managed the deal. Reuter
